summary: The likeable and carefree Grand Duke of Abacco is in dire straits. There is no money left to service the State's debt; the main creditor is looking forward to expropriating the entire Duchy... See full summary »
cast: Mady Christians|Harry Liedtke|Robert Scholtz|Alfred Abel|Adolphe Engers|Hermann Vallentin|Julius Falkenstein|Guido Herzfeld|Ilka Grüning|Walter Rilla|Hans Hermann Schaufuß|Georg August Koch|Max Schreck|Balthasar von Campenhausen|Hugo Block
title: Las finanzas del Gran Duque
